articles.description: The star will begin her residency in November, 11 months after it was originally due to start.
articles.content:
By Mark SavageBBC Music Correspondent
Adele's long-postponed Las Vegas residency will finally begin in November, 11 months after its original launch date.

articles.title: Bob Rafelson: subtle and complex director was presiding genius of the Hollywood new wave - The Guardian
articles.description: Rafelson was a director who got era-defining performances out of Jack Nicholson in Five Easy Pieces and The King of Marvin Gardens, as well as co-creating the Monkees
articles.content: Of all the creative energies and commercial synergies that swirled around Hollywood at the end of the 1960s, surely the strangest was the one between the Monkees, actor Jack Nicholson and the produce… [+5540 chars]

articles.title: Dec Donnelly's new son shares names with best mate Ant and late father - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Dec and wife Ali Astall announced the birth of their son, who is partly named after Dec's co-star and father
articles.content:
Declan Donnelly and wife Ali Astall have announced the birth of their son, Jack, whose full name includes nods to Dec's father and his best mate.
